sentences.english: The successful application of the dry filling system in Donggouba Gold Mine is described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述乾式充填系統在東溝壩金礦的成功應用。

sentences.english: More generally eastern Europe has been hit hard by the reversal of private capital flows.
sentences.chinese: 更多的東溝國家由於私人資本的撤出倍感壓力。

sentences.english: The Donggouba area lies on the north rim of "Mian-Lue-Yang trigonalgeological zone" in southern Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 東溝壩地區位於陝南“勉略陽三角地帶”北緣。
